title.rendered: Top 13 Virtual and Augmented Reality Companies to Watch in 2025

content.rendered:
It would be wrong to say that the benefits of augmented or Virtual Reality are confined to gaming only. The technology has already entered various business verticals, transformed them, and generated huge revenues.

According to a Marketsandmarkets report, the Augmented and Virtual Reality market will reach USD $96.32 billion by 2029, with a CAGR of 34.2% from 2024 to 2029. 

However, choosing a reliable and best-in-class Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality development company can be difficult. It requires careful planning and good understanding. So, we have considered various parameters, including industry expertise, third-party integration capabilities, post-launch support services, Goodfirms and clutch rating etc. 

We have compiled a list of the top 13 AR and VR companies in 2025. Let’s explore! 

Want to Deliver Impactful Experiences to Users?

Our AR/VR experts build engaging solutions that drive exceptional results with 100% accuracy.

Contact Us

Top 13 Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality Companies

Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality are transforming industries like gaming, healthcare, and education. Here are 13 leading AR/VR companies that are pushing the boundaries of immersive technology.

1. invertio

Hourly rate- < $25/hr

Year of experience- 20+ 

Number of Projects- 4200+ 

Happy Customers- 2500+ 

Client Retention- 97.0% 

Good Firms – 5.0 ratings 

We are one of the leading AR/VR Development Company in India. We have a track record of delivering unique, customized, and engaging AR/VR applications to start-ups, entrepreneurs, and enterprises at affordable prices in 31+ countries globally.
Established in 2004, we have more than 450 employees, including software developers, UIUX designers, full-stack developers, and project managers. We are recognized by NASSCOM, Deloitte, and ISO for its on-time delivery and advanced software application development solutions.

Also read: The Future Of Augmented Reality And Virtual Reality

2. PixelCrayons

Hourly rate- $15-25/hr

Year of experience- 20+ 

Number of Projects- 12500+

Happy Customers- 5400+

Good Firms – 4.9 ratings

PixelCrayons is an award-winning IT & Software Outsourcing Company offering end-to-end solutions to Enterprises, ISVs, Digital Agencies, and Startups. They are also among the best virtual and Augmented Reality development companies, offering a wide range of services since 2004.

It is a one-stop solution for companies looking to outsource AR & VR development services. Being a trusted software development outsourcing company, they assist clients from different industries in all phases of their software development needs.

 

Also Read: How AR/VR Transforming Shopping Experience In Upcoming Years?

3. ScienceSoft

Hourly rate – $50- $99/hr

Year of experience – 35+

Number of Projects – 4,000+

Happy Customers – 1,300+

Good Firms – 5.0

ScienceSoft is a Texas-based software development company with 28 years of experience in 3D modeling and 18 years in AR/VR development. ScienceSoft develops high-precision AR and VR apps for retail, healthcare, manufacturing, supply chain and logistics, real estate, education, and more industries. The team creates simple marker-based AR apps and complex markerless software using image analysis and machine learning engines.

They develop high-precision AR and VR apps for retail, healthcare, manufacturing, supply chain and logistics, real estate, education, and more industries. The team also creates simple marker-based AR apps and complex markerless software using image analysis and machine learning engines.

ScienceSoft covers the process of AR/VR software development end to end, from project planning and business analysis (feasibility study, functional and architecture design, VR hardware selection) to 3D modeling, app coding, QA, and deployment.
To test your app idea without a large upfront investment, ScienceSoft is ready to create a prototype, proof of concept, or MVP.

The company has ISO 9001, ISO 27001, and ISO 13485 certifications and an in-house project management office to successfully deliver projects of any complexity despite time and budget constraints.

Don’t Let Poor User Engagement Hold You Back?

Boost interaction and conversion with our tailored AR/VR solutions.

Connect Now

4. Monkhub Innovations

Hourly rate- < $25/hr

Year of experience- 5+ 

Hourly Rate – < $25/hr

Clutch – 5.0 ratings 

Good Firms – 5.0 ratings 

Monkhub is focused on emerging tech with in-house certified tech experts, trained business analysts, and proficient designers, qualified in handling complex projects end to end. They have collaborated with many businesses, ranging from early-stage startups to Fortune 500 companies globally.

They are among the top augmented and virtual reality companies in India. They also offer the app, metaverse, blockchain, game, and web development, along with AR/VR/MR, AI/ML & Data Science, IoT & Robotics, UI/UX, Graphic Design, etc services.

Also read: Augmented Reality: A Comprehensive Guide To Its Use-Cases And Importance

5. Toptal

Hourly rate- $100 – $149 / hr

Year of experience- 15+

Number of Projects- 1000+

Happy Customers- 25,000+

Clutch Rating- 4.9

Toptal is a leading AR and VR application development company located in San Francisco. The company is a reputable Augmented Reality app development company that offers innovative mobile or web applications developed using advanced AR technology.

Their expert team uses innovative and indigenous methods to build applications with a wide range of features.

The company is composed of experts who have deep knowledge of AR and VR technology and years of expertise in the field. It has more than 1,000 employees and is recognized by Good Firms, Clutch, and Upwork.

Worried About Underperforming AR/VR Business Apps?

Our expert team will optimize it for peak performance and user satisfaction.

Contact Us

6. Vention

Hourly rate- $50 – $99 / hr

Year of experience- 20+

Number of Projects- 1000+

Happy Customers- 500+

Clutch Rating- 4.9

Vention is a one-stop AR & VR solution provider with decades of experience in deploying and delivering cutting-edge games and mobile applications. The company has a keen eye on customer-centric product designs and offering innovative solutions.

The company has various key clients, including ClassPass, Bevi, EY, Coca-Cola, and many more. Clutch and GoodFirms recognize it as a top-notch VR and AR company in India.

It aspires professionals to attain their business goals through best-in-class web design and development services.

7. Quytech

Hourly rate- $25/hr 

Year of experience- 10+

Number of Projects- 500+

Happy Customers-  250+

Client Retention- 90.0%

Good Firms- 4.5

Quytech is a top-notch AR and VR application development company in India that has a decade of experience in consulting and developing mobility solutions that receive immense popularity from clients across the world.

The company has a track record of building AR and VR apps for start-ups, enterprises, and entrepreneurs in more than 10 countries. It offers its partners thorough services, including designing, conceptualization, and developing of software products.

Looking for Custom AR/VR Solutions for Your Industry?

Whether healthcare, retail, or gaming, we help you develop the industry's best AR/VR solutions.

Contact Us

8. Fingent 

Hourly rate- $25-49/hr

Year of experience- 18+

Number of Projects- 800+

Happy Customers- 600+

Clutch Rating- 4.9

Fingent is one of the leading AR and Virtual Reality development companies that offer concept-driven, scalable, and interactive application services to people across the globe.

From eCommerce development to mobile app development, Augmented Reality to Virtual Reality app development, the company offers a broad spectrum of IT services.

The company has been recognized by Good firms and Clutch as a best-in-class company. It has worked with big brands, such as Johnson-Johnson, CBN, AGP, Royal Enfield, and PWC.

9. DianApps

Hourly rate- $25-49/hr

Year of experience- 7+

Number of Projects- 250+

Happy Customers- 200+

Clutch Rating – 4.8

DianApps is a top-notch software development company that offers digital experiences, from custom 3D solutions to initial concepts.

It deploys cutting-edge technologies to help its clients stay ahead of the curve. DianApps is also known as the top virtual and Augmented Reality development company. Their team builds responsive websites and trending apps that can take your business to a new level.

They also offer innovative digital marketing solutions that help your business stand out in the crowded marketplace. Its key clientele includes Curu, Kult, Minimalist, Caratlane, Uber Eats, and many more.

Also read: Top 10 Advanced Augmented Reality Tools To Skyrocket Business

10. Techugo

Hourly rate- $70-99/hr 

Year of experience- 5+

Number of Projects- 250+

Happy Customers-  100+

Client Retention- 80.0% 

Good Firms- 5.0

Techugo is a best-in-class virtual and augmented reality development company that builds scalable, robots, and advanced applications for start-ups, entrepreneurs, and enterprises. The company turns traffic into clients and clicks into customers.

The company has 250+ employees and partnered with big organizations, like airtel, Indofil, Dhanuka, and Godfrey Phillips and entrepreneurs across the globe. It is also recognized by Global 2000 companies, Fortune 500, Fortune 200, and by current political Indian Prime Minister- Narendra Modi as one of the best AR and VR companies.

Also read: Top 12 Virtual And Augmented Reality Companies

11. Innowise

Hourly rate- $50- $99/hr

Year of experience- 17+

Number of Projects- 1300+

Happy Customers- 100+

Clutch Rating – 4.9

Innowise offers an exclusive and amazing digital brand experience for physical places and spaces.

The company is one of the top-notch AR/VR development companies that offers its clients projection mapping and multi-touch interactive installations for festivals, events, museums, exhibits, and corporate environments.

It was incorporated in 2007 and so far served hundreds of clients across the globe and thus seen as one of the top AR companies in India. It has worked with many big clients, such as HAYS, Google, PayPal, LVMH, Nike etc. and have won hearts of many people across the globe.

Cut Your AR/VR Development Time in Half

Get high-quality AR/VR solutions faster with our industry-leading experts.

Contact Us

12. Variance Infotech

Hourly rate- NA  

Year of experience- 7+

Number of Projects- 500+

Happy Customers-  200+

Client Retention- 80.0% 

Good Firms- 4.8

Variance Infotech is one of the trendiest augmented and virtual reality companies in India that helps its clients to achieve their long-term objectives and short-time objectives deploying the latest and powerful technologies and resources.

The company discovers research, analysis, and brainstorm and after that follows optimized processes and practices for AR and VR application development. The company is awarded by recognized rating firms, such as Clutch, Good Firms, and associated with big organizations like ESC, and ISO.

Also read: Top Augmented Reality Trends To Look Out

13. Fluper

Hourly rate- NA  

Year of experience- 15+

Number of Projects- 500+

Happy Customers-  200+

Client Retention- 80.0% 

Good Firms- 5.0

Fluper is a top-notch VR and AR app development company in India that has the potential to bring optimized and specialized solutions for start-ups, enterprises, and entrepreneurs. In the span of 15 years, the company has built a team of  500+ certified app developers.

The company offers 9 months of free app promotion, 2.5 years of maintenance and support at zero cost, and 60 days app development change. The company is recognized by Trustpilot, Appfutura, and top app creators.

Also read: How Will AR/VR Shape The Future Of Businesses?

How to Choose the Right AR/VR Development Partner for Your Business?

When selecting the best AR/VR development company, consider the following tips to ensure you make the best choice for your business:

Business Goals with Tech Expertise

  • Ensure the partner understands your industry and business objectives.
  • Look for a provider with a proven track record in delivering solutions that align with your strategic goals.

Customization Abilities

  • Choose a partner tailored to your business needs.
  • Hire developers who assess their ability to integrate with your existing tools.

Post Launch Support

  • Prioritize providers offering robust and responsive support services.
  • Consider ongoing training and resources available to help your team maximize its potential.

Long-Term Partnership Potential

  • Look for a partner interested in building a long-term relationship, offering continuous updates and enhancements.
  • Hire dedicated software development teams who can assess their ability to scale and adapt new technologies.

Case Studies & Testimonials

  • Research client success stories and reviews to gauge the partner’s reliability and customer satisfaction.
  • Seek feedback from existing clients to understand the partner’s strengths and areas for improvement.

Which Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality Company Will You Choose?

Choosing the right AR/VR development partner is key to bringing your ideas to life. While your decision should reflect your project needs and budget, invertio stands out with 20+ years of experience, a 97% client retention rate, and top industry ratings.

From startups to enterprises, businesses across 30+ countries trust invertio for cost-effective, innovative, and scalable AR/VR solutions.

Ready to start your AR/VR journey? Contact us today to discuss your project.
